metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0463 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Accessibility in Google Chrome prior to 98.0.4758.80allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific userinteraction to potentially exploit heap corruption via user interaction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
